title: Waiter Yasuo - Skin Idea!!
body:
So i found someones pixel art creation online which looked really cool.

It was a picture with battle bunny riven and yasuo in there (dressed as a waiter)
http://imgur.com/FNJV5Nw

Design:
As you can see from the photo, he is in a suit with a waistcoat, his table cloth would act as his sword (he attacks as if he was whipping his Table cloth, cause physics)
he also has his plate tray (or whatever it's called) on his left hand, he would hold this whilst in idle animation but he would drop it when he's mobile (a bit like his drink in his original skin), the tray and wine also would appear in special animations (like taunts, laugh and stuff)

This is how I thought his abilities would gel with the skin:

Q - Steel Tempest
instead of him using his sword to stab, he would be whipping a table cloth in the direction
on 3rd Steel tempest it would spin out a table cloth as if it was spinning like a tornado.

W - Wind wall
Instead of wind blocking the projectiles, it would be a table cloth that he places on the ground,
which blows in the wind ( a bit like a flowing movement, like a bed sheet being blown in the wind).

E - Sweeping Blade
when Yasuo dashes through an opponent (whether minion or champion, he serves them a drink (as if he was a really fast waiter)
instead of the wind timer, it would be wine, with a wine glass at the end of the timer, moving around the tail of the circle).

R - Last Breath
When Yasuo flies up to his opponent, a table lands below them (if multiple targets, multiple tables),
he uses his table cloth to beat them down, once they land they smash the table below them, then the table cloth (yasuo's katana),
becomes covered in wine (which is his armor penetration buff).

Recall:
Yasuo's Recall would summon a bar in front of him with 3 glasses on it, he then proceeds to pour them with alcohol (as if he was serving a customer)

Dance:
Yasuo's dance would make the ground a table instead of flowing wind, while he plays his flute (as if he was performing)

Taunt:
Yasuo drinks some of the alcohol he has on him then spits it onto the towel (basically the same as before)

Laugh:
same as always

Joke:
Instead of him balancing his drink on his sword, he summons a table in front of him taking shots
(I think this fits well with his joke dialogue "Who says i can't handle my drink" and "The blade above all things, except a good drink")


That's my idea on the skin so far, if you'd like you can leave your comments or ideas down below, and this is a WIP so don't expect anything.

-Copper
